B

BOUND_UNITED_KINGDOM - Static variable in class couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.overlays.OutOfBoundsOverlay.BoundingBox
UK bounding box, uses the following values: 60.854691, 1.768960, 49.162090, -13.413930

O

onMapStartedMoving() - Method in interface couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.interfaces.StartStopMovingCallbacks
This is fired as soon as the map starts moving, it doesn't matter how it starts moving, as soon as it moves this is called.

This is fired when the map stops moving.

OutOfBoundsCallbacks - Interface in couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.interfaces
 
OutOfBoundsOverlay - Class in couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.overlays
This object is designed to listen to other events coming from the map overlays and tell you if out of bounds.
OutOfBoundsOverlay(AbstractAMLController<?>) - Constructor for class couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.overlays.OutOfBoundsOverlay
 
OutOfBoundsOverlay.BoundingBox - Class in couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.overlays
This is a non-mutable bounding box.
OutOfBoundsOverlay.BoundingBox(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.overlays.OutOfBoundsOverlay.BoundingBox
Create a new bounding box for the map, remember that these must represent NW/TopLeft and SE/BottomRight.

For example the UK is (60.854691, 1.768960, 49.162090, -13.413930)

R

registerOutOfBoundsListener(OutOfBoundsOverlay.BoundingBox, OutOfBoundsCallbacks) - Method in class couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.AbstractAMLController
Register and set the bounding box
registerOutOfBoundsListener(OutOfBoundsCallbacks) - Method in class couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.AbstractAMLController
Register a OutOfBounds listener, remember you need to set the bounding box, so if you haven't called AbstractAMLController.registerOutOfBoundsListener(OutOfBoundsOverlay.BoundingBox, OutOfBoundsCallbacks) or AbstractAMLController.setOutOfBoundsBounding(OutOfBoundsOverlay.BoundingBox) nothing will happen.
registerStartStopListener(StartStopMovingCallbacks) - Method in class couk.chrisjenx.androidmaplib.AbstractAMLController
Register a start stop listener, this is a fairly dumb overlay, it will notify when the map is moving and when its stopped.
